property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. King.

property.name: Text
property.value: If Robert Baratheon is the only Baratheon King character in play, he gains: "You may initiate an additional Power challenge during the challenge phase."

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. King.

property.name: Text
property.value: If Renly Baratheon is the only Baratheon King character in play, he gains: "Reduce the cost to play other Baratheon characters by 1."

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. King.

property.name: Text
property.value: If Stannis Baratheon is the only Baratheon King character in play, he gains: "Players cannot draw cards through card effects."

property.name: Traits
property.value: Knight. Rainbow Guard.

property.name: Text
property.value: Baratheon Lord characters you control get +1 STR.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments except Weapon.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Knight. Rainbow Guard.

property.name: Text
property.value: Baratheon Lord characters you control gain stealth.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments except Weapon.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Knight. Rainbow Guard.

property.name: Text
property.value: Baratheon Lord characters you control gain: "Response: Kneel 1 influence to save this character from being killed."

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments except Weapon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Kneel Salladhor Saan to choose and discard 1 location from play.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. Knight.

property.name: Text
property.value: During Power challenges, Ser Cortnay Penrose gets +2 STR and gains vigilant.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win an Intrigue challenge in which Maester Pylos attacked alone, discard (at random) 1 card in Shadows controlled by the losing opponent.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel Marya Seaworth to choose and stand 1 character.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Veteran Knight is attacking or defending, opponent's participating characters lose all [War] crests.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments except Weapon.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Asshai. Ally.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Sister of Truth comes out of Shadows, choose 1 [Shadow] card in play. Return that card to Shadows.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Baratheon only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Kneel Bearer of the Light to lower the cost of the next Asshai character you play this phase by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Discard the top 2 cards of your deck to choose 1 character in any dead pile. Move that character to its owner's discard pile. (Limit once per round.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: Knight. Army.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you play Knights of the Storm from your hand, you become the first player. (Players who have already marshalled cannot marshall again.)

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Renown. No attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: While there is at least 1 Night's Watch character in play, Stannis's Cavalry gains renown.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Deadly. No attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a Power challenge by 4 or more total STR, return Lost Captain from your discard pile or dead pile to your hand.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Knight. House Florent.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Ally. Bastard.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Baratheon only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Asshai character only. Vigilant. Attached character is immune to opponent's events. Response: After a card is discarded from an opponent's hand, kneel Ruby of R'hllor to draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gets +1 STR for each power on your House.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Item. Crown.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique Baratheon character only. Setup. If Crown of Azor Ahai is standing and White Raven is not in play, it is Summer. If Crown of Azor Ahai is knelt and Black Raven is not in play, it is Winter. Any Phase: Kneel Crown of Azor Ahai.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your revealed plot card gains the Power Struggle trait. If it has the printed Power Struggle trait, raise your claim value by 1 during Power challenges.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel Salla's Escort Ship to choose 2 characters. Until the end of the phase, one of those characters gets -1 STR, and the other gets +1 STR.

property.name: Traits
property.value: King's Landing.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may choose to play King Robert's Chambers as an attachment to your House card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Kneel Great Hall to lower the cost of the next Baratheon character you play this phase by 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Kneel Stormlands Fiefdoms to lower the cost of the next Baratheon card you play this phase by 1.

property.name: House
property.value: Stark. Baratheon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Discard Narrow Sea from play to reduce the cost of the next Stark or Baratheon character you play this phase by 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you play an event card from your hand, put it on the bottom of your deck instead of discarding it. Marshalling: Kneel Pyre of the False Gods and pay 2 gold to return 1 event card from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: During a Power challenge, kneel Smuggler's Cove to choose 1 participating character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +2 STR and gains stealth.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you win dominance, instead of claiming 1 power for House, you may claim 1 power each for 2 different Baratheon characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Choose and stand or kneel 1 character with at least 1 power.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Baratheon only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Choose 1 participating Baratheon character. That character gets +2 STR and gains renown until the end of the challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Return 1 Baratheon character to your hand (cannot be saved) to put another Baratheon character with the same cost (and different title) into play from your hand.

property.name: House
property.value: Stark. Baratheon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Choose 1 character with a Military and a Power icon that is attacking alone. For the duration of the challenge, that character gets +2 STR. If you win the challenge, instead of the normal claim effects, choose a non-unique location controlled by the losing opponent. Take control of that location.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Stark or House Baratheon only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win dominance or after you win a Power challenge, reveal the top 5 cards of an opponent's deck, discard 1 of the cards, and put the rest on the top of the deck in any order.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Baratheon only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel 3 influence to choose 1 Knight or 1 Army character in your discard or dead pile. Put that character into play.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Baratheon only.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you control more Knight characters than each other player, draw 1 additional card in the draw phase. While you control fewer Knight characters than each other player, draw 1 fewer card in the draw phase.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Knight. Ally.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Knight. Kingsguard.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win dominance, each player must choose and discard all but 4 cards in his or her hand.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Fanatical Follower gets +1 STR for each Roseroad and each Searoad in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gains the Knight trait, and gets +1 STR.

property.name: Traits
property.value: King's Landing.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each character gets +3 STR while it is standing.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a Power challenge by 4 or more total STR, claim 2 power for your House. Limit 1 per challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Put into play from their owner's dead piles or discard piles all characters that were killed or discarded this phase. Any opponent may discard his or her hand of at least 1 card to cancel this effect.

property.name: ErrataText
property.value: Should read: '... that were killed or discarded from play this phase. (Limit one per phase.)'

property.name: Text
property.value: At the end of the marshalling phase, discard all cards in Shadows.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Intrigue Gambit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Treat all plots with a name other than Forgotten Plans as if their text box were blank during every phase except the plot phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may have up to 2 copies of The Power of Faith in your plot deck. [Holy] characters you control gain a Military icon and do not kneel to attack.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Military Battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Characters and locations cannot be saved.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, place the top card of your discard pile on top of your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, you may choose to add +6 gold to your income this marshalling phase. If you do, you cannot initiate challenges this round.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Power Struggle.

property.name: Text
property.value: A player cannot initiate a Military challenge unless he or she has won a Power challenge that phase.
